nodes.text: The father of the Rebel Alliance soldier Emon Kref was a male general in the Koshagan People's Movement, a group of freedom fighters who led an uprising against the ruling class of the planet Koshaga for many years. Around 3 ABY, however, the Galactic Empire conducted a an operation which quickly defeated the People's Movement, taking leaders like Kref's father prisoner.
Emon Kref's father was mentioned in the short story "Beyond Hope," written by Michael Moreci as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
